tasks.task: Assembling and setting up a drip irrigation system for a garden.
subtasks: Connecting the drip irrigation system to a water faucet.
Using a battery timer to manage water release.
Customizing the system for different types of gardens (vegetable, raised beds, containers).

tasks.task: Installing a battery timer for a drip irrigation system.
subtasks: Locating and attaching a battery timer to the irrigation system.
Programming the battery timer for precise watering intervals.

tasks.task: Connecting a drip irrigation system to a water hose faucet.
subtasks: Attaching the faucet adapter to the water hose.
Linking the adapter to the drip irrigation system's inlet.
